website_summaries.verdict: Mid-rise walking boot with signature Skechers comfort and flex features.
pros: Equipped with a waterproof oiled leather shell and air-cooled memory foam insole
cons: Might be a bit too wide for the average foot, and heel collar can be bothersome to some people

customer_reviews.title: Did not last very long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for work. My environment is not very demanding or harsh. The rubber sole began to separate from the leather upper a few weeks ago. I really hoped to get more use from them. I purchased April of 2018. I regularly apply a good brand of shoe balm to help preserve the leather. Fit was good and comfortable to wear. I have tried to use gorilla glue on the separation in hopes of getting more use. I am disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and good looks!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these new boots for about 1 week now and I have to say, they are very comfortable. I bought my regular size 10.5 and they fit well, although a little wide, but that's fine. The inner foam sole is very comfortable, plus they look really good too. I work in an office but frequently have to go out to agricultural fields and these boots are very adequate in both atmospheres. Very happy with my purchase. Would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: akimofro

customer_reviews.title: WIll keep buying these ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband has order 5 pairs of these ankle boots loves them. He does lawn/tractor work and they hold up better than other boots. Also his knees/legs have stopped hurting. The only complain would be that the price changes. I have paid from $73.46 to $37.72.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I did try these on in the store, so I knew the size (they fit the same as my usual size). I found them on Amazon for $20 less so I went ahead and bought them here. They're really comfortable, I've walked a couple miles at a time for work in them and didn't even think about my feet, which is AMAZING because at the moment I actually have a small fracture in my big toe.. They fit well, feel durable and the waterproof bit is nice too. I do feel like I need to wear slightly thicker socks with these on in order for them to really fit snug though.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking shoe but it is not waterproof as described. I am a delivery man and need a comfortable waterproof shoe being that I'm out in the elements. I've wore my pair for five days and I have to say that it is a very comfortable shoe to wear all day but if you need 100% waterproof like myself don't get this. Today 11-9-18 here in Houston Tx. was raining and it didn't take much for water to get into the shoe. My foot was moist for hours because of water getting into the shoe causing the shoe to smell. I give the shoe looks 5 stars, comfortable 5 stars, waterproof 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: pac8565

customer_reviews.title: "The Squeaky Shoe Gets The Greese...." WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I was just going to return this shoe due to the annoying squeak but I read NightSky724's review and he nailed it. He used vaseline in his fix. I used a silicone spray on one shoe and a product called Ballistol on the other, just as a test. Both worked just fine and entirely eliminated the squeak. Apply the lubricant sparingly (use something that is leather friendly) to the area shown in the attached photo (tip of orange pointer) where the tongue rubs against the two sides. You might as well coat the entire tongue for a uniform color. BTW these shoes are great if you have a bunion issue. I'm thinking about ordering another pair just for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: J Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Does run a little wider than expected but feels great. I wear every day to work and my personal favorite. Wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Weller

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable boots I ever worn and they look great, fit perfectly and no hot spots. And in the middle of a cold winter here in nyc and they keep my feet warm without the need of any heavy socks
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I am on my third pair of the boots in 3 years and absolutely love them. I wear them daily and put them ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tryed many many different boots. From big name expensive brands to cheapys. I am on my third pair of the boots in 3 years and absolutely love them. I wear them daily and put them through hell on the farm. I have never been a sketchers fan but they did it all right with this shoe. Comfortable and durable. I haven't been able to find anything comparable for the money and will continue to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Size 11- 2W  Foot bed insert is removable
customer_reviews.text: Some folks in reviews for this product questioned based on arch support,if foot bed is removable?,yes. I bought Spenco total support original insoles here on Amazon that I use in my other work boots. They were highly recommended by a very helpful shoe store sales clerk. These boots fit and feel great,look great and are useful for work,play,casual wear. I bought them for fall/winter wear to replace tennis shoes. Also reasonably light too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Serviceability
customer_reviews.text: After less than 3 months the sole came fell off one of my boots. I have had a few pair of these boots and was always happy with the product. This was a big disappointment. There seems to be no way to contact the seller or Amazon about this failure.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good Width
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Skechers I've bought. I like them because they're quality shoes and they offer width options I can't find with other brands. I bought this for a light hiking boot. I opted for a 12 medium which would normally be too tight, but hoped that Skechers would make it slightly wide. I was right, it fits perfect, holds my foot just snug enough that it doesn't roll inside the shoe. The overall workmanship is very good, claims to be waterproof, and the soles are very grabby on a smooth floor, no slip, should be good working across rocks. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Skechers normally produces a great product and this shoe is not "horrible" but just not for me. Great look and good reviews from other buyers, however, this shoe size ran small and the quality of the shoe was not up to Skechers normal standards. I wore them for a few hours for two days and my feet were killing me. No arch support, leather is stiff and flimsy. The soles, laces, waterproofing and the tab in the back to pull the shoe on are all fantastic. I really wish they had worked for me. I was excited when they arrived but very disappointed wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair and just as satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I had the first pair for over 5 years wearing them about once or twice a week as a teacher to work. The design has slightly changed. The newer design is a little darker and more comfy. Both the new and old are relaxed fit and look great with shorts or khakis and a tie. They breather well and wear well but these are NOT for hardcore working and do not have steel toes. These are more dressy/casual boots. Both pair I have had run big. I usually wear a 10.5 but I always get 10's with these boots and they fit perfectly. When they say "relaxed fit," they mean it.
customer_reviews.author: Rowland

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel like there in house slippers
customer_reviews.text: My job provides me with150.00 safety toe redwings every year and outside of work I rock 130.00 timberland for fashion. For comfort cost and fit these 70.00 skechers but them both to absolute shame. I put these boots on out the box and worked a 12hr shift. Yes zero break in time was needed and there as light as running shoes. I'll keep a pair of redwings at work when the job calls for safety first otherwise I'll keep my house slippers oops I mean skechers on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Another Skechers  Home Run
customer_reviews.text: I buy Skechers for the comfort, and these are comfortable. These are both comfortable and are holding up well to the snow and ice. I've been wearing them just about every day since December, and they are still comfortable and waterproof.. even after I stepped in a puddle up to my ankles the other day. I would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: rudy tecat

customer_reviews.title: Fits my wide feet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased work boots from a well known manufacturer but had to send them back because the "Wide" designation meant "Medium". My feet do not fit in anything but Wide and X-Wide. These boots were X-Wide and at first I though it would be a problem. But then I worked outside for a couple hours and didn't notice the boots, which means they fit perfectly. My wife says that I should purchase a 2nd pair just in case they run out. I will probably follow her recommendation. In addition the quality seems pretty good and they're lighter than other boots that I've purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Rancourt

customer_reviews.title: Stop Thinking About It -- Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a casual shoe/boot for Michigan winter wear for work (office casual dress). These are perfect. Fit as expected, very comfortable, great toe box, sharp look. Hats off to the reviewer who suggested a fix for the squeak. Yes, they squeaked when I walked when I first put them on - I put a little Vaseline on my finger tip, ran it around the inside of each eyelet for both shoes and voila! - no more squeak! My first pair so I can't comment on their longevity and wear but I'm already considering a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Russell

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a superior shoe that would not only keep me warm but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in 2016 for a trip to Europe at Christmas. We were travelling through Bavaria and ending up in Vienna for New Years. I was looking for a superior shoe that would not only keep me warm but would accommodate larger socks as well. This shoe has far surpassed my expectations. Not only did it serve beyond my needs on the top of Zugspize (look it up), but it continues to serve me today in the warm climate of South Carolina. I'm about to buy another pair because I wear them any time I want to look "casual-sharp". They wear a bit bigger than you size, so don't go up a size if you are not sure.
customer_reviews.author: D. DICKSON

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Work Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband who works on his feet all day long. He always demands something light weight, study and comfortable and a decent price. These fit the bill and will be reordered as soon as he needs another pair. They are like a suede material and will leave "marks", so they will be beat up looking so they wont be for important outings. Strictly work.
customer_reviews.author: Kris P-Carter

customer_reviews.title: butterscotch maybe...wheat  no
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of skecher memory foam shoes. They have made it possible for me to remain on my feet for a much greater amout of time than with other shoes. I highly recommend Skecher shoes. That being said, these particular shoes, or at least the pair delivered to me, can by no means be described as wheat in color. They are not close in color to the picture, they are more of butterscotch or peanut brittle color. They are comfortable shoes that fit right but, if you are looking for the color the word "wheat" has been used to describe, these are not them.
customer_reviews.author: nkrnzm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot, and American made.
customer_reviews.text: My opinion is that these boots are perfect for casual outings, and working in the field. The lugs on the sole are smaller than the other skechers boots I own which are a good boot too, so mud and stuff is easier to clean so I dont track it all over the shop and porch. Waterproof is just a added bonus. Good heal and arch support is the main reason I buy these type of shoes. If you never owned a pair of skechers, dont knock them till you try them. Plus skechers has no fool telling them what to sell and not too. My opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, comfortable, waterproof, and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted some wet weather shoes that were bootish but not too much like work boots, so these serve double duty. I wear 12M and they fit perfectly and were comfortable out of the box. I immediately wore them for several hours while doing a few things in the garage, and they were great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Large Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I have some toe issues, and I needed shoe with large toe box. I tried others, but this is the most comfortable shoe I own. I bought another pair, and alternate days using them as work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MarvinM

customer_reviews.title: Same Shoe; Different Decade
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of this model Sketchers over 10 years ago. I wore that pair all over the world when I traveled. The fact that they are extremely waterproof enabled me to keep touring despite encountering some very inclement weather, including both rain and snow. Through it all, my feet stayed dry and comfortable the entire day. These shoes are stylish enough (at least for the first few years of wear and tear) that they can be worn to dinner. After 10 plus years, the waterproofing began to fail ever so slightly. Thank goodness Sketchers continues to make this same model shoe. As the saying goes; "Don't leave home without them".
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for the waterproof factor. I work in a metro area with a long walk from the parking garage to the office and wanted some waterproof boots for rainy and snowy days. These boots were so comfortable that I ended up wearing them every day. I wore the tread out on the first pair in about a year and a half and I am now on my second pair. I demoted the old boots to yard work and mud boots. The boots are fairly lightweight, but the insoles are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Confortable Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these long but so far so good. They are comfortable shoes. I am not sure about the durability. Certainly good enough to wear around town with jeans. Not what I would call a hiking shoes, but it is not advertised as one either. Solid support in the ankles. The inner sole is a bit on the flat side and I would recommend an insert if you have problems with your feet. All-in-all, I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pair is a little larger than I expected since size 11 is normally a little snug, but it laces up nicely. This is a good choice for someone looking for this style of shoe. I can not speak of its durability . Although I have had generally good experience with Skechers shoes, that has not always been the case. The attached photo is an example a defect that showed up only after a few wearing's of a purchase awhile ago. In spite of this disappointing pair, I am pleased with my last two purchases
customer_reviews.author: Sherman D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 extra wide foot, so it’s kinda hard to find shoes. These do a great job! They’re a tiny bit too big but it’s ok. I’d rather a little too big than too small. The memory foam sole is great and very comfortable. Came with leather laces which are a real pain and I will likely replace them soon with regular nylon or 550 cord. Not bad shoes for the price especially if you have a hard time finding shoes for bigfoots like myself.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Hate boots but these are really nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable shoes I have bought. I hate boots. I need some for vacation in Colorado so checked on these. I can just say wow. For so nice and they are very comfy. Waterprooof so they say and the grips are nice.
customer_reviews.author: pattyconklin

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof, that’s why I bought them. First time they got wet they leaked feet where soaked.
customer_reviews.author: George M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes and boots are very important for me. Without going into my foot issues I found these boots have some nice bounce to them and are very comfortable. They're wide enough and easy to get on and off. I have been wearing them for a while now and they seem to be a nice solution for me. They are holding up well and don't look like some of the clunky corrective shoes I've worn. I will be buying this particular brand and style again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Garraty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable work boot/shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Put these on and immediately felt the comfort on my feet. I've worn them all weekend and really like the way they look and feel. You can wear them in a casual setting or in the work place. I'm on my feet a lot and comfort and durability or important to me. These shoes left me feeling good a lot like my Georgia Logger Boots do. I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I found this pair of boots at a local department store, but they were $25 more than this pair on Amazon. I love the look and feel of these boots. I had to return the first pair only because it was .5 too big. I shipped the first pair back and ordered another pair all in the period of 5 days. As a teacher, I'm on my feet for most of the day and usually prefer to wear tennis shoes; however, after wearing them today, I have NO back pain at all. Very comfortable shoes for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mysinger

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that was lighter than my normal hiking boots but more durable and water proof/resistant than normal sneakers. This is it! Very comfortable to wear, sturdy and so far are great in some easy hiking. I will take them to Iceland, with my more normal hiking boots, to give them a real try out. I have several Skecher shoes, various styles, and they all meet or beat my expectations. I'm sure these will as well.
customer_reviews.author: David at beach

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly what I wanted for working outside or wearing in sloppy weather. They do seem to be water resistant. The only downside is the two pieces of non-leather material that attach the sides of the tongue to the shoe. They are stiff and may chafe some wearer's feet. I don't see the need for them. So far, so good for me. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Overall Decent Pair of shoes for Moderate Activity
customer_reviews.text: The fit was true to size. I used these for a 2 week trip in Europe with some hiking and festivities. They are durable, held up well for the trip and most importantly, kept my feet dry in the rain. My only complaint is that my feet shifted a little more than I like inside them, just enough to notice, but not enough to be uncomfortable. Overall good shoe by Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely wide enough without going overboard.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe needs a little bit of break in, like all shoes, but the fit is perfect. I'm used to buying a size too big because my feet are wide. These are PERFECT! I accidentally got them soaked the first time out and can confirm they are waterproof. After drying, I couldn't even tell they had been wet. I haven't had them long enough to tell how they will wear, but first impressions are very positive.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a really wide foot and we were not sure these would work but he liked the style so we tried, VERY IMPRESSED! He normally wears a 4E and theshoes fit with a "bit snug" but after wearing them about 4 or 5 times he says they really are a good fit and a well balanced shoe. He wears them to work and for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, NO LONGER waterproof, but squeak!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a previous reviewer...the boots are very comfortable, waterproof and fit as expected. However, they do squeak where the tongue rides against the eyelets. A touch of Vaseline will help. Update! 4.22.20 I've had these boots since mid-November of last year. They are very comfortable and have finally quit squeaking...but they are no longer waterproof! :-( The moisture infiltrates around the toe area. :-( I still wear them if I know I am not going to encounter wet areas...but I wish they were still WP.
customer_reviews.author: PeachNPink

customer_reviews.title: The left shoe appears to be a 2nd!  Customer service is non-existent!
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the left shoe is stitched so that it angles to the left, making it very uncomfortable to wear. Will NEVER purchase a pair of Skechers again! Their customer service is almost non-existent (after 4 weeks, no response to my emails)
customer_reviews.author: Spokane Dude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Trip to Iceland
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a heavier but not hiking style boot for my trip to Iceland. I needed them for the walking around in 30 degree weather and like climbing. These fit the bill perfectly. They came in wide to fit my fat feet with a good athletic sock. My feet were never cold and as best as I can tell, they were waterproof from rain and slush. They are very comfortable and I expect to wear them often
customer_reviews.author: DLMDO

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair of Boots Except they Squeak
customer_reviews.text: These boots look and feel good, but they squeak when you move around in them. The squeak did not start until I have worn them for a day. The squeak comes from the tongue area when the leather on leather rubs together. I plan to try some oil on the tongue to see if that will stop the squeak, but haven't tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice boot but the level of comfort ratings make me think they were not real reviews. My feet hurt all the time and I need a comfortable shoe and this is not it. They have a gel insole that does nothing. I broke them in for a week at work then took them on vacation where we walked an average of 5 mile a day. I felt like I was walking on bare bones. Anyone that rates this shoe as extremely comfortable is either not being honest or they don't know what a comfortable shoe is. I would not recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W. Bulla

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this chucks although you should check the size table because they run a tiny bit wide when your dealing with the width but that being said the shoe is great in comfort and looks will also keep your feet dry from rain and not to deep puddles great all round shoe I recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: Richi,,,

customer_reviews.title: The size
customer_reviews.text: The size i received was not the size I ordered. Ordered 2W, received M width. Did not notice, until I wore them. The packing slip indicated a 2W shoe was enclosed, but after i wore them and realized they were tight, i lookes in the shoe and found the Medium (M) width indication.
customer_reviews.author: Allan A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes them
customer_reviews.text: Husband says the boots are heavy and they make noise when you walk. I read a review that might fix that but he hasn’t complained so I’ll leave it. In my opinion they are good looking boots, and fit well over boot cut jeans, I don’t think they’d look right with straight leg jeans. I hope they last awhile!
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Not for anyone who is on their feet all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be work shoes. I work in a shop and stand on concrete all day long. At the end of the day my feet hurt worse after wearing these than they did with any other shoe I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: E T Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: "Relaxed fit" means wide
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made. I just missed the fact that "relaxed fit" really means wide. They are comfortable enough to keep, but just seem a little loose for what I'm used to. I haven't had a chance to verify if they are actually waterproof or not, but I'd guess more like resistant than proof.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Happle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was my second pair. First pair I had to stand in water for over 3 hours during a flood and the souls fell off. I knew they were a lower quality shoe and was okay that the souls fell off because of the water damage. But the second pair I only had for 3 months no standing in water and the soul fell again. No more Skechers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and wide!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the boots. They are very comfy and after the leather breaks in they’re even better. You will still feel a large rock if you sep on some protruding from flat ground but not in an overly distracting way. They will not keep your feet warm. Either wear thicker socks or get actual insolated boots. If you’re in warm areas they won’t be bad at all. Held so far after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great boots I love them but bad shoe laces
customer_reviews.text: There nothing to dislike the shoes are very comfortable and I take a 13xw I'm 6'4 270.they are hold up great in the snow and salt ,waterproof is great no wet socks I wash windows and work with water all day from pressure cleaning houses and roofs to washing windows with machines,best boots I've owned. Update cons : shoe laces broke in less then three months bad quality lacings, saw there was other comments about lacing breaking
customer_reviews.author: Smith's

customer_reviews.title: D Is My Normal Size; These Are Wider than Normal
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes but they are wider than expected. I like the shoes enough that I am going to wear thicker socks and have the laces narrower than normal. I wear many brands that fit right on width. These are just a little wider than normal. the 4/5 rating is for extra width. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TX Christian

customer_reviews.title: What happened Skechers?
customer_reviews.text: This brand use to be very good quality Purchased these in Feb 2020 the seam on both are coming apart Quality is not there DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: chad smith

customer_reviews.title: falls apart but comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Right and left shoe both are falling apart with normal use.. this is a definite flaw and company should replace as well as improve product.. very comfortable and good support but that's only as good as the time the shoe stays together.. my job is mostly inside work so outdoor factors are not really invovled..can't imagine what shoes would look like if I was outside mostly.. yikes!
customer_reviews.author: emark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fit and comfort of this low boot. The less amount of eyelets to allow easy foot entry was also a nice plus. These boots replaced my older Sketcher boots which I wore out and I really like these much better. Waterproof too and I was in wet areas. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, the construction and the fit of this boot. My only concern was that I thought the boot would be a bit taller in order to provide more ankle support. My two previous pairs of Skechers (Holdren Brenton Chukka) gave the ankle support, but I like the lacing system of this Melego Leather Chukka. I also prefer leather to the faux leather of some boots.
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: Not a work shoe for a big man.
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying I am 6ft 3", and 260 lbs... I have been a fan of Sketchers, to which I have purchased several pair and happy with all... these however fell below expectation, especially in the comfort / support area. There just is not enough. After a few days break in, they are still without the comfort needed for all day wear. I feel the ground through the sole.. can't explain it better. IF I had chosen to test/wear them indoors, I would have returned them. Sorry to say
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Feel great and look good
customer_reviews.text: I have been a diehard Timberland buyer for more than 15 years, but I decided to try something new. I must say I am very pleased with the comfort and quality of these boots. I can't speak to the memory foam insoles as I had to remove them to install my special Plantar Fasciitis insoles.
customer_reviews.author: BrentH

customer_reviews.title: Clown Sized Boots
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11D Boot. I returned an 11 and a 10 1/2, ending up with a size 10. THEY ARE HUGELY WIDE!!! A 9 1/2 soul embarks too short in length!!! Ilike the look of the shoe but, honestly, why can’t Skechers make boots for the average size man’s foot???
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not enough arch support
customer_reviews.text: Although this particular Sketcher shoe wasn't cramping my husband's foot on the top side, it has very little arch support. We're returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F

customer_reviews.title: My new go to shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great ankle support, comfortable and a rugged looking style. I am enjoying these boots, I typically look for a 5e in my size and the WW was perfect! The leather is stiff, but I imagine it will break in nicely! I wear my footwear a lot because of back/joint issues, and this is quickly becoming my go to pair!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These ended up exceeding my expectations. This is the first shoe, even in wide width, that my foot wasn't cramped in. They are very roomy an comfortable. I wear an business casual. They do look large though. The leathers wears nicely if taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Luck

customer_reviews.title: Acurate
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice inexpensive shoe/boot. I have been using them about 3 weeks in the field and they come as advertised. It took about a week of everyday wear to break-in, but were comfortable from the start. Cushioned insole and ample arch support. Yes the tongue does squeak a bit but I don't notice it unless it's quiet. I haven't tried the Vaseline trick yet....
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Sezate

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 13 and I ordered and received a 13 today. I could easily stick more than an index finger between my heel and the back of the boot. Way too big and my heel was slipping and it just didn't fit right. Returning them tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: livingaboard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 10-1/2 or 11 tennis shoe. I ordered 11 they fit good but a smidget loose but since falls coming up i can wear my wool socks thats thicker and they real easy slipping off or on. Look like nice browning style boots but lower cut than real boot. Best ones ive had yet.
customer_reviews.author: Corey D.

customer_reviews.title: Inexplicably became harder to put on for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this shoe it seemed to slide on easily, but after a few months of use it seems to have shrunk. I now kind of struggle to fully get it on without having to untie the laces which are difficult to untie. This is rather bizarre as it’s almost as though either the shoe got smaller and/or my heal somehow became bigger and more swollen.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Tees

customer_reviews.title: Nothinv Sketchy about the Comfy Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Christmas gift for our daughter's fiance. He is a big man. These Skechers ,size 14 wide worked perfectly for him. In most shoes he wears a 15. In Skechers, a 14 wide is perfect. He likes the looks, the fit and the memory foam comfort.
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these are for my husband. he has worn this style for several years and he hopes they never discontinue them. he uses them for casual, work, hiking everything. he suffers with rheumatoid arthritis and a back condition. these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: sonie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots that are definitively waterproof.  They are a little roomy in the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: We tested these right when we got them in a rainy bass fishing tournament. It rained all day and my feet were DRY all day. They have extra space above your foot but I wear two pairs of thick socks to stay warm so it worked out perfect for me. Great shoe for the money, well done Skecher!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B.

customer_reviews.title: I really like these - the "relaxed fit" gives me plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these - the "relaxed fit" gives me plenty of room in the toe box. It definitely compares to a wide width in most other shoes. I normally wear a size 13 in most athletic shoes, but in these a 12 is just about perfect with the extra width in the toe. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: jcazz

customer_reviews.title: Thor boots
customer_reviews.text: Listen here my dude this boots Boiiii ...!THIS BOOTS RIGHT HERE are very solid build like these went through some real mean mission a gravitational collapse on a star bigger than your mothers baggys from the Grocery store the exceptional quality until the shoe lace torn off after reaching the core of a dying star. For 6 months took it like tank no honestly I put mad hours on these having a full time and a part time 67 hours a week for the whole summer non stop near all types of cleaning chemicals and dirt so yea consider that when the shoes enter the black hole in created another one inside it bc y not
customer_reviews.author: Derick

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the price. I have no idea how long they will last, but definitely happy with my purchase. Fits good and seems to be decent quality. These are not Redwing work boots, but prefect for casual dress or walking... have not tried waterproof yet
customer_reviews.author: Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe seems to be well constructed and fits good. They are waterproof so far which I really like and they are not real heavy which is great too. I like to oil my outdoor footwear so hopefully I will get a few years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Royal H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great water-proof plus med-light-weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great water-proof plus med-light-weight shoes, although one shoe had a different shade (top part) darker than the other, I gave it five stars since I dislike returning items if I can help it, besides; I will be wearing them to work out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Good looking- run on the large side
customer_reviews.text: I love Skechers. Just so comfortable. I am in between a 9 and 9.5, so I always go larger. This is one that I wish I had gone smaller. In the winter with heavy socks it is great. In warm weather there is movement inside. Look great. Leather wears and ages well
customer_reviews.author: MagMan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a shoe that works well as a semi-formal and casual shoe at the same time. I love the cushion insole and it appears to be a well made shoe. I need wide shoes but this one is just a little wider than I like but still suits me.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton W. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, runs big though.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great for everyday use. Very comfortable and durable so far. The only thing I reccomend is order a half size or a full size smaller than you actually wear. I had to return and re-order a smaller boot size. I wear a size 10 and had to order 9 1/2. Honestly a size 9 would probably fit too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Runs wide
customer_reviews.text: The must have done a redesign on this model because they used to fit perfect. Have owned 2 pairs over the years. What ever they did they are much wider than they use to be. Quality was good but they were too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: mflick35

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable casual boots. Definitely not for work, but I think great for hiking, walking through a small amount of snow (I haven’t had a wet foot yet) and casual wear. I’ve had them for a couple months now and wear is normal thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Twilitegolf

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe, but never had opportunity to test out waterproof ability from date of purchase until now. Took walk through wet grass two months ago and feet got soaked. Recent flooding rains in the South made evading puddles impossible making feet wet again. Will try spraying with waterproofing product, but if default is in the seams it won't help. Will try though because shoes are very comfortable. As I thought, spraying did not improve anything. NOT waterproof. Obviously defective when made, but...very comfortable. Good walking/working boot just stay away from wet grass, puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great looking
customer_reviews.text: Used them for rainy weather in England. Comfortable for walking around and look nice with jeans. I have a wide foot and they fit actually a little wider than I need but I just used thicker socks. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes with style. Needed a pair of shoes that are waterproof but can still wear with Khaki pants and polo. These fill the need better than expected. The intent was to wear during rainy days mostly, but they are so comfortable, I wear them most days rain or shine. Wear with jeans or casual dress pants. Would recommend highly. More comfortable than expected, fit as expected, priced very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these boots 10-14 hours/day Monday-Friday every week. I stand indoors on flat smooth concrete 90%+ of the time I wear them. I received these boots on July 10th 2019 and they have completely eradicated my knee and ankle pain. But it is now September 5th 2019 and the soles are already separating from the shoes, they are extremely comfortable and very nice looking shoes but DONT expect them to last because I work in a very mellow warehouse and the soles aren’t holding up indoors.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: loose your chance
customer_reviews.text: well made (produced in Vietnam), true to size, very comfortable, tested during 2 weeks in hard conditions(snow, melting snow, black ice and in all conditions this boots proved to be made as 'mud + snow tires'. I like them, and recommend these boots for those who are looking for casual, comfortable and reliable boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is excellent for what I was looking for after sampling a number of shoes. I wanted a good, comfortable and supportive shoe for hiking, that was light. This shoe is IT. Excellent in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan M. Lang

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them, however there's a spot on his ankle that rubs so that he has to wear a bandage. He figures they just need to be broken in. We'll see. But otherwise, they look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I take a 10 in women's, got an 8, perfect. Not too heavy, similar to my old hikers they do not make anymore. I love these. Comfortable, support, cushioned perfectly. I wear them as everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie

customer_reviews.title: The good , the bad and the ugly.
customer_reviews.text: The sewing on the left shoe is off ; the lace piece is about 1/4 inch off and though it doesn't seem to affect how it fits, it kinda strange to look down at my feet and see this construction defect. It makes the shoe crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have to say first impressions the shoe looks and fits well. Very comfortable. I will update review after I wear them for awhile. Presently I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BklynBob

customer_reviews.title: MY HUSBAND SAYS THEY ARE THE MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES HE'S EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in maintenance & wears these to work, they are well-made & last over a year (& he's very hard on shoes), where all others he's tried last a month or 2 & hurt his feet. We always have a 2nd pair on hand as a backup, because he cant do without them! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: RACHAEL WALLS

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, needs breaking in, wear boot socks, beware of salt
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to combat the early winter I am getting up north. Overall I enjoy them. They did take a bit more breaking in then I expected, but overall it was fine. One thing I will say is that they discolor very easily when in contact with road salt. It turns them a much lighter color in that spot. It's easy to get out the salt, water and a rag worked, but living in the far north, road salt is a given in the winter and having discolored shoes walking into meetings and presentations isn't exactly putting my best foot forward.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Boot!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a boot that would fit my wide feet and also be waterproof. This boot did both and was very lightweight and comfortable and waterproof for the morning dew I walk through. They do squeak, but the Vasoline trick a previous reviewer recommended took care of the squeaks. I will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: DanLR

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: They worked well but the life of these shoes are too short. The broke down to quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots Sketches Rules the Feet
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift for my brother and he says they are the most comfortable boots he's ever worn. My brother and I have XW feet and Sketchers makes boots and shoes that fit our feet perfectly. Another note: They were delivered on SUNDAY by the Post Office which I found pleasantly shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Dean S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a fit!
customer_reviews.text: This boot actually fit correctly, arch supports and shanks in right places for my feet. Quite frankly as comfortable as :early' Clarks English teachers shoes of many moons ago ;)
customer_reviews.author: Terry Millen

customer_reviews.title: definitely waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I walked through some water that was 4" deep with these shoes and my socks stayed dry - they're really nice shoes, though, so I don't wear them at work like I intended to - I wear them out and about
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted five months
customer_reviews.text: Great look and fit. 5 months and separating at heel. Bummer because they were just getting broken in. I wear them in a cabinet shop but only wear them 70 percent of the time . Not beating them up. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting boot
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and light weight. I bought these boots 6 months ago and work them 5 days a week in a junkyard and garage. They developed a curl to them. I literally beat my the life out of boots though. Was testing to see if something would hold up. This lasted almost 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jake J

customer_reviews.title: Super nice boots. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves them ! Soft leather, excellent footbed ( support but soft like a cloud). He wears only sketchers and was extremely happy with the boots.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Segment Melego Leather Chukka Waterproof Boot
product_meta.description:
* Expand your taste in style and comfort with the Relaxed Fit Segment - Melego by SKECHERS®. 
 * Smooth oiled leather upper is waterproof.
 * Lace-up closure.
 * Soft fabric lining.
 * Relaxed Fit® design for a roomy comfortable fit.
 * Gel Infused Memory Foam cushioned comfort insole.
 * Shock absorbing supportive midsole.
 * Flexible rubber high traction outsole.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Weight: 1 lb 1 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Mocc-toe chukka boot featuring perforated side panels and lace-up front with metal eyelets
